question: Who among the following was Viceroy of India at the time of partition of Bengal (1905)?
explanation: The Partition of Bengal was announced on 20 July 1905 by Lord Curzon, the then Viceroy of India and it was commensed on 16th October 1905. After that Swadeshi Movement took place in India by boycotting foreign goods. Finally, the British Government (Lord Hardinge) revoked the partition of Bengal in 1911.
